document_data.name: Smoke-Cured Ham
document_data.mainbody: '''Smoke-cured ham''', or simply '''smoked ham''', was a variety of [[ham]], cooked and cured by the smoke of hot burning wood.
document_data.Description: Smoke-cured ham was sliced to order. It had a distinctly [[salt]]y and smoky taste.
document_data.Usage: Cubes of smoked ham were an ingredient in the rustic [[split pea soup]] from the [[Dalelands]] in [[central Faerûn]].
document_data.Availability: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], sliced up smoke-cured ham was served at the [[Lonesome Tankard]] of [[Eveningstar]] in the Forest Kingdom of [[Cormyr]].
